articles.author: By Tara Subramaniam, Andrew Raine and Sana Noor Haq, CNN
articles.title: Russia's war in Ukraine: Live updates - CNN
articles.description: Vladimir Putin is expected to sign agreements Friday that will formally absorb into Russia thousands of square miles of Ukrainian territory in what will be the largest forcible annexation of land in Europe since 1945. Follow here for live updates.
articles.content:

articles.title: Q+A Nord Stream gas 'sabotage': who's being blamed and why? - Reuters
articles.description: Major leaks that suddenly erupted in the Nord Stream gas pipelines that run from Russia to Europe under the Baltic Sea have generated plenty of theories but few clear answers about who or what caused the damage.

articles.title: Spread of hepatitis A virus strains of genotype IB in several EU countries and the United Kingdom - European Centre for Disease
articles.description: Clusters and outbreaks of hepatitis A virus (HAV) genotype IB with four unique but closely related HAV sequences have been reported in six European Union (EU) countries and in the United Kingdom (UK).
articles.content: As of 29 September 2022, 303 cases with identical or closely related HAV strains have been identified in Austria (7), Germany (8), Hungary (161), the Netherlands (8), Slovenia (35), Sweden (8), and t… [+3448 chars]
